completeListOfAbilities.name: Fulminating Darkness
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
2-hit group melee  PG attack + group  PF attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Increases BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt
Target: 2 turns Lock
Self: 3 turns Kingdom's Shieldã€? HP Damage Resist
(Up to 1 Kingdom's Shield may be simultaneously active in a partyã€? with the newest effect taking precedence)

ailments.name: Kingdom's Shield
ailments.desc: Kingdom's Shield: Reduces BRV damage taken; group PF attacks hit self in place of allies

ailments.name: Lock
ailments.desc: Lock: Unable to switch target

ailments.name: HP Damage Resist

passives.name: Ruin Impendent Extension
passives.desc:
When using Ruin Impendent:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

While Knight's Aptitude active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack;  PG attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage)
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee  PG attack +  PF attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; slightly restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of own MAX HP)
